channel.title: 5 Questions
channel.itunes:author: Greg Demetrick
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Interactive Podcast Quiz Show
channel.itunes:summary: 5 Questions is an interactive podcast quiz show. Each week we post 5 questions to our website and encourage our listeners to answer them through e-mail, skype, audio comments, or by calling our listener hotline. On Thursday we will compile the best answers to the questions into a show for podcasting on Friday. We also include a guest on every show and allow our listeners to be stars themselves.

item.title: Semi-Permanent Hiatus
item.itunes:subtitle: Semi-Permanent Hiatus
item.description:
The last set of questions came out in May and it's now August. If you haven't guessed it by now my focus on 5 Questions as a show is pretty much shot. After 2 years and marginal success my focus is more on projects that are shorter term and less of an overwhelming experience for me. 5 Questions was a project where I did everything from content creation to engineering to publishing to marketing and that takes a toll on a person.
One thing that has been great is the audience. Your answers have shocked and surprised me. Your participation helped to make this show great. While there will be episodes in the future, they will be fewer and far between on no set schedule. I have some answers for the last set and still need audio files but I don't know when it will be coming out.
Thank you for your continued support of the show and dealing with all of my delays. A new show will come out, I just don;t know when. Until then feel free to check out my other project 365 Tao or catch me from time to time as a contributor on GuildCast
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Show Fifty Four - May 7th, 2007
item.itunes:subtitle: Show Fifty Four - May 7th, 2007
item.description: April turned into May but flowers still bloom in a new show. Grits2Glitz, Bart B and Oblivion stop by for a new show. We pomo some favourite podcasts and look for your answers to next month's show.
item.content:encoded:
April turned into May but flowers still bloom in a new show. Grits2Glitz, Bart B and Oblivion stop by for a new show. We pomo some favourite podcasts and look for your answers to next month's show.

item.title: Questions for Show 53 on April 30th, 2007
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions for Show 53 on April 30th, 2007
item.description:
A bit of a NYC theme today with some Mashups and questions. Announcing the new site
To answer the questions, use our answers form leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. Call our hotline at 206-350-0261. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
What is your best Scrabble word? Would you attend a party with many fascinating people you have never met if you had to attend alone? Is it the language that someone speaks or the culture in which someone lives that influences their viewpoint the most? If you were to add a 13th month into the year, where would you put it and what would you call it? Would you take 5 months off to travel the world if you only had a 50/50 chance of being employed when you got back?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.title: Show Fifty Three - April 1st, 2007
item.itunes:subtitle: Show Fifty Three - April 1st, 2007
item.description: It's our 2 year anniversary and we couldn't be happier. We could be healthier as you will hear my cold quite a bit but the answers outshine anything. TC, Grits2Glitz, BartB, and the Chattanooga boys stop buy with their audio comments for this month's show. Don't forget to leave a review in iTunes, vote at Podcast Alley, or stop by and say hi when I am presenting at PodcampNYC next weekend. Click the Show Notes link to See Amy and Bay's excuse for getting the audio in so late.

item.title: Questions for Show 53 on March 30th, 2007
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions for Show 53 on March 30th, 2007
item.description:
New questions for a new month. Shooting for a show date of March 30th for this one. We really need more audio comments so please try and answer that way.
To answer the questions, use our answers form leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. Call our hotline at 206-350-0261. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
What is your favorite special feature on a DVD? What would be the three main rules ifyou ran your own country? Coke or Pepsi? Should the game of Basketball have a power play situation when someone is fouled; similar to the game of hockey? What is the value of Optimism?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.title: Questions for Show 52 on January 31st, 2007
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions for Show 52 on January 31st, 2007
item.description:
Trying to set a hard date of Jan 31st here and get into a monthly publishing schedule. Hopefully this will work because I miss creating this show as much as I hope you miss listening to it.
To answer the questions, use our answers form leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
What villain from literature or history do you relate to the most? Is society overtly obsessed with celebrities? Dogs or Cats and Why? What gift would you like to receive for the holidays? (Must be something tangible) If you could name a planet, what would you name it and why?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.title: Why there are so many delays
item.itunes:subtitle: Why there are so many delays
item.description:
Well, we definately didn't plan on only doing one show a month but that is how this year seems to be shaping up. There are many reasons for the delay which I wanted to let you all know about.
First, I am building a new office in the house which has sucked down a lot of my time. When I say building, I mean put up walls, wire for power and network, insulate, put up drywall, mud and tape the walls, paint (where we are now), arrange and rebuild studio, empty boxes, then hopefully be done. The reason for this to take priority has to do with the weather. It's starting to turn cold in the north so I needed a completed office with heat to just be able to work.
Second, a different audio project has taken up some of my time. We are still looking for voice talent on that so if you are interested, drop me a line through comments.
Third, the holiday season is right around the corner in the US and I am just getting run down. The company has taken on some good new contracts which meand more money for Christmas gifts as well as 100 and 1 things to be done for the new year.
I sincerely apologize for the delay and new shows are on tap for the near future. We will hit our podcasting stride again.

The reason for this to take priority has to do with the weather. It's starting to turn cold in the north so I needed a completed office with heat to just be able to work.

Second, a different audio project has taken up some of my time. We are still looking for voice talent on that so if you are interested, drop me a line through comments.

I sincerely apologize for the delay and new shows are on tap for the near future. We will hit our podcasting stride again.

item.title: Questions for Show 51 on September 29th, 2006
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions for Show 51 on September 29th, 2006
item.description:
A listener appreciation show with your questions. Hopefully some answes to follow as well.
To answer the questions, use our answers form, call our listener's hotline at 206-984-3006, leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
From Dr. Eggman: What annoys you most about technology? From Chuck: Are you proud of where you are living? Why? From Ethereal: If you could start doing one thing today that would make this world a better place, what would you do and why? From Patrick: Do you think a politician can solve important problems? Why or why not? What is the theme song for the movie that is being made about your life?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.title: Questions for Show 50 on September 5th, 2006
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions for Show 50 on September 5th, 2006
item.description:
It took us a while to get here but here we are. Show 50 is on tap for launch on September 5th, 2006. Interactivity is the name of the game here and we would love to hear from all of our past participants of the show. So take a couple of minutes our of your holiday weekend in the US and aswer this very special edition of 5 Questions.
To answer the questions, use our answers form, call our listener's hotline at 206-984-3006, leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
What is the greatest problem facing your country today? Could a superhero save the world today? If you could own any costume or outfit, what would you choose and why? What film or TV Show would you like to see a new series made of? Guest Question from Dr. Eggman of Sacramento, CA: What is your favorite cheese dish?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.title: Questions for the August 26th, 2006 Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions for the August 26th, 2006 Show
item.description:
Gearing up for the show 49 extravaganza so we are pushing a full show out to next week. Also we wanted to sync show 50 with our trip to DragonCon and set it up for show 51 at PodCamp Boston. So you have some extra time to get in on the big big show.
To answer the questions, use our answers form, call our listener's hotline at 206-984-3006, leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
If you could swap places with anyone for one day, whom would you choose and why? If you could be at any one event, which one would you choose and why? If you had to have dinner with Kate Moss, Lindsay Lohan, or Kylie Minogue whom would you choose and why? If you could tour any factory or plant in the world, which one would you choose and why? If money was no object, what hobby would you like to tryr?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.itunes:author: Greg Demetrick
item.dc:creator: Greg Demetrick
item.itunes:summary:
Gearing up for the show 49 extravaganza so we are pushing a full show out to next week. Also we wanted to sync show 50 with our trip to DragonCon and set it up for show 51 at PodCamp Boston. So you have some extra time to get in on the big big show.
To answer the questions, use our answers form, call our listener's hotline at 206-984-3006, leave a message at our Skype number at fivequestions or e-mail us an MP3 file to comments@5questions.net. If you call the listener hotline, send an MP3 or Skype, make sure to leave your name and location if you want it used on the show.
If you could swap places with anyone for one day, whom would you choose and why? If you could be at any one event, which one would you choose and why? If you had to have dinner with Kate Moss, Lindsay Lohan, or Kylie Minogue whom would you choose and why? If you could tour any factory or plant in the world, which one would you choose and why? If money was no object, what hobby would you like to tryr?
Remember that creativity when answering the questions counts. Creative answers are more likely to get you on the show.

item.title: Show Fourty Eight - August 8th, 2006
item.itunes:subtitle: Show Fourty Eight - August 8th, 2006
item.description: Talking about summer since the heat has broken in the North Eastern US. Some new questions and answers, a program note for people listening through Yahoo Podcasts, and just a fun half hour listening to your answers. Special mention to our new respondants at the Grits to Glitz podcast.
